QuestData.Title: The Farmers' Militia
QuestData.Description: The battle started when they attacked us from the rear. I let my guard down, and a group of poorly-armed farmers and militiamen swung into our flank from the Writhing Haunt.$b$bThey may be weak, but unchecked, they threaten to overwhelm us with their numbers.$b$bLindsay's pet abominations can handle the melee combat. You take this collar, stay in the rear, and use it to release my ebon gargoyle upon these farmers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Ebon Gargoyle Collar on 6 Provincial Militiamen within Andorhal.
QuestData.CompletionText: Deal with these farmers now, $c. That is your primary objective. Teach them how truly unprepared they were for the horrors of war.
QuestData.RewardText: Merely a dent in their numbers... but the sight of their fellow men falling from the skies surely weakened their resolve.
